ORIGAM Documentation : How to add Save and Refresh button to screen in workflow

Created by Ondrej Walter on Aug 05, 2014

1) Set AllowSave = True
2) Fill in SaveDataStrucutre
3) Fill in RefreshDataStructure
4) Fill in RefreshMetod
